attribute_description: Name of the dataset.
Name of the "raw" file used to generate this dataset.
Name of the project associated with this dataset.
Narrative description of the dataset.
Words that might be used to search for the dataset.
Source of the data. Include enough information to track down the data source. Could be an instrument.
If the data set was produced by as derived data from R code, provide R script file name, R script author and link to github respository.
Date that a file with this name was first created.
Date that this file was last modified.
Current version number for this file
Brief narrative of file edit history
Name of each person to edit the dataset with names seperated by comma. The last name on the list should be the last person to edit the file.
Earliest date of collection for data in the data set.
Last date of collection for data in the data set.
Collection location(s) for data in the dataset
List of species associated with the dataset
Life stages associated with the dataset
Person(s) who entered the source data from hard copy
Person(s) who were involved in generating or recording the data
Principle Investigator
The home institution that generated and/or owns the data
Person(s) to contract with questions about the the data
Email addeess of the data point of contact
Location on google drive or githup where data are archived.
Directions on how to cite the dataset.
Acknowledgements that need to be included in any use of the data.
Any datasets associated with this dataset (e.g. datasets that are part of the same study).
